description: Gets information about an existing Amazon Q Business web experience.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application linked to the web experience.

parameters.name: webExperienceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business web experience.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application linked to the web experience.

nested_items.name: webExperienceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business web experience.

nested_items.name: webExperienceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role with the permission to access the Amazon Q Business web experience and required resources.

nested_items.name: defaultEndpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint of your Amazon Q Business web experience.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the Amazon Q Business web experience. When the Status field value is FAILED, the ErrorMessage field contains a description of the error that caused the data source connector to fail.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the Amazon Q Business web experience was last created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the Amazon Q Business web experience was last updated.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The title for your Amazon Q Business web experience.

nested_items.name: subtitle
nested_items.description: The subtitle for your Amazon Q Business web experience.

nested_items.name: welcomeMessage
nested_items.description: The customized welcome message for end users of an Amazon Q Business web experience.

nested_items.name: samplePromptsControlMode
nested_items.description: Determines whether sample prompts are enabled in the web experience for an end user.

nested_items.name: origins
nested_items.description: Gets the website domain origins that are allowed to embed the Amazon Q Business web experience. The domain origin refers to the base URL for accessing a website including the protocol ( http/https), the domain name, and the port number (if specified).
(string) ---

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service role attached to your web experience.

nested_items.name: identityProviderConfiguration
nested_items.description: Information about the identity provider (IdP) used to authenticate end users of an Amazon Q Business web experience.

nested_items.name: samlConfiguration
nested_items.description: Information about the SAML 2.0-compliant identity provider (IdP) used to authenticate end users of an Amazon Q Business web experience.

nested_items.name: authenticationUrl
nested_items.description: The URL where Amazon Q Business end users will be redirected for authentication.

nested_items.name: openIDConnectConfiguration
nested_items.description: Information about the OIDC-compliant identity provider (IdP) used to authenticate end users of an Amazon Q Business web experience.

nested_items.name: secretsArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a Secrets Manager secret containing the OIDC client secret.

nested_items.name: secretsRole
nested_items.description: An IAM role with permissions to access KMS to decrypt the Secrets Manager secret containing your OIDC client secret.

nested_items.name: authenticationConfiguration
nested_items.description: The authentication configuration information for your Amazon Q Business web experience.

nested_items.name: samlConfiguration
nested_items.description: Provides the SAML 2.0 compliant identity provider (IdP) configuration information Amazon Q Business needs to deploy a Amazon Q Business web experience.

nested_items.name: metadataXML
nested_items.description: The metadata XML that your IdP generated.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role assumed by users when they authenticate into their Amazon Q Business web experience, containing the relevant Amazon Q Business permissions for conversing with Amazon Q Business.

nested_items.name: userIdAttribute
nested_items.description: The user attribute name in your IdP that maps to the user email.

nested_items.name: userGroupAttribute
nested_items.description: The group attribute name in your IdP that maps to user groups.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The message explaining the Amazon Q Business request error.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with the Amazon Q Business request error.

nested_items.name: browserExtensionConfiguration
nested_items.description: The browser extension configuration for an Amazon Q Business web experience.

nested_items.name: enabledBrowserExtensions
nested_items.description: Specify the browser extensions allowed for your Amazon Q web experience.

nested_items.type: Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Opera, etc.
nested_items.description: CHROME -- Enables the extension for Chromium-based browsers (Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Opera, etc.).
FIREFOX -- Enables the extension for Mozilla Firefox.
CHROME and FIREFOX -- Enable the extension for Chromium-based browsers and Mozilla Firefox.

nested_items.name: customizationConfiguration
nested_items.description: Gets the custom logo, favicon, font, and color used in the Amazon Q web experience.

nested_items.name: customCSSUrl
nested_items.description: Provides the URL where the custom CSS file is hosted for an Amazon Q web experience.

nested_items.name: logoUrl
nested_items.description: Provides the URL where the custom logo file is hosted for an Amazon Q web experience.

nested_items.name: fontUrl
nested_items.description: Provides the URL where the custom font file is hosted for an Amazon Q web experience.

nested_items.name: faviconUrl
nested_items.description: Provides the URL where the custom favicon file is hosted for an Amazon Q web experience.
